title: (ANDROID) FIFA 12~~(TIMETHIEF)
description:

Experience the action of your favorite sport like never before! Watch matches come to life with vibrant graphics and ultra-realistic animations.

From the English Premiership and La Liga, to the German Bundesliga and beyond Ã¢â‚¬â€œ dominate your league and march toward glory in 32 authentic stadiums.

MATCH DAY MADNESS

Capture the passion and power of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular sport with unprecedented authenticity. This is the deepest, most visually striking football title ever. Feel every thrill on the pitch with your heroes, anytime, anywhere.

Football is life! Now live it to the fullest with the ONLY officially licensed FIFA game on Android!
